description: Bagnacavallo is the site of a Roman pagus located east of the centuriated area of Faventia.

history.comment: Reimported full way geometry and updated provenance

references.formattedCitation: Stillwell, Richard, William L MacDonald, and Marian Holland McAllister, eds. The Princeton Encyclopedia of Classical Sites. Princeton, N.J.: Princeton University Press, 1976. http://www.perseus.tufts.edu/hopper/text?doc=Perseus:text:1999.04.0006.
Corpus inscriptionum latinarum. Berolini: Apud G. Reimerum, 1862.
Wikipedia: Lenciclopedia libera e collaborativa (2001-), Bagnacavallo.
